thread.title: Atletico Madrid want Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann to stay for another year
thread.title_full: Atletico Madrid want Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann to stay for another year

author: leeastley
title: Atletico Madrid want Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann to stay for another year
text:
Atleti's Griez plea Atletico Madrid want Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann to stay for another year 
The Spanish giants are hoping to keep the French international until the end of next season Gossip Comments ATLETICO MADRID want Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann to stay at the club for another year. 
Griezmann is Jose Mourinho’s No1 summer transfer target and is thought to be ready to make an £85million move to Old Trafford. Getty Images Atletico Madrid want Antoine Griezmann to stay at the club for another year 10 things you may not know about French striker and Manchester United target Antoine Griezmann 
But, according to the Telegraph, Atletico want their star striker to wait another season before moving to the Premier League club. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester United news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
And United have shown they are capable of splashing out mega-money after signing Paul Pogba for a world record £89m last summer. Getty Images 4 Antoine Griezmann is wanted by Premier League giants Manchester United 
Lacazette, 25, - who Atletico tried to sign in January of last year - has been told by Ligue 1 giants Lyon that he can leave the club. 
But the La Liga club could face stiff competition from top English clubs for the Frenchman. related stories Antoine Griezmann will DEFINITELY join Manchester United, says ex-Arsenal star Emmanuel Petit ONE IN, ONE OUT? Man Utd receive huge boost in pursuit of Antoine Griezmann as Atletico Madrid line up Alexandre Lacazette Not so Grizi Griezmann plays down talk of Man United move by claiming he wants to 'make history' with Atletico Madrid Kroos control Manchester United set to bid for Real Madrid star Toni Kroos as £100m Antoine Griezmann deal stalls FIVE MOUR YEARS Jose Mourinho to be offered new five-year deal at Man United to oversee club's £1bn redevelopment Who are ya? Ten things you didn't know about Atletico Madrid star and Man United's £85million target Antoine Griezmann Getty Images Antoine Griezmann has an £85million release clause in his contract with Atletico Madrid Getty Images 4 Alexandre Lacazette is being lined up as a possible replacement for Antoine Griezmann 
Arsenal and West Ham are among those said to be interested with the Gunners reportedly having a £29m bid rejected last summer. 
But Lyon president Jean-Michel Aulas hinted he now open to cash in on the attacker. 
He said: "We don't have to do anything, but as we have a squad valued at more than €170m, there will come a time when we have to cash in on that capital."
